title: Leaves of Absence--Repealed
context: CHAPTER 79 LEAVES OF ABSENCE REPEALED. L 2000, c 253, §132; L 2001, c 123, §16(2). Note L 2001, c 37, §1 purports to amend §79-33. Cross References For other leaves of absence provisions, see §§78-23, 78-23.5, 78-23.6, 78-27, 302A-614, and 302A-616; prohibited when, see §76-30.5.
